footer.betaTool_html: v0.0.1: This is a beta tool! We ♥ to get feedback on Telegram: %{telegramBrazilLink} or %{telegramEnglishLink}

header.title_html:
Bring your videos
to the future
header.description: Decentralisation is changing the business of online video and giving the power back to peers

videos.title: Meet your fellow pioneers
videos.description: Explore short stories, music clips, and formats that our community is inventing every day.

notFound.title: Oooooops, page not found
notFound.description: This page is not available yet. A passionate team is either building it or doesn't know about it. Want to help us move faster? Please tell us how you got here with an issue on our Github:

results.zeroState: Enter some keywords above to search!

uploader.youtubeOrVimeo: (Not working yet) Or upload from Youtube or Vimeo

enterPassword.title: Enter your password
enterPassword.description: Please enter your password to use all the features of Paratii

error.title: The password is not valid
error.formErrorMessage: The password is not valid, please retype the password

restoreAccount.title: Rewrite your account recovery phrase
restoreAccount.description: Rewrite the 12 words of your recovery phrase to continue the process
restoreAccount.errorMessage: The 12 words you entered are not valid

secureAccount.title: Before you proceed your account needs to be secure
secureAccount.description: It won't take more than a minute

choosePassword.title: Choose a password
choosePassword.description_html: Please insert a password of eight characters or longer, containing at least one uppercase letter and one number

errors.passwordMismatch: Hey, your password do not match
errors.eightCharacters: The password must be eight characters or longer
errors.numericCharacter: The password must contain at least 1 numeric character
errors.uppercaseCharacter: The password must contain at least 1 uppercase alphabetical character

showSeed.title: Your account recovery key
showSeed.description_html: This is your recovery key. It's like a password that will restore your account. %{keepSafe}
showSeed.keepSafe: Keep it secret. Keep it safe

copy.confirmCopy: I have copied the 12 words. They are secret, safe and sound

notification.title: Copied!
notification.description: Your key has been copied to the clipboard
